text: [Chapter 25b][Sector 4, Shadow Realm Research Center]
Break: ...
Break: It seems you vermin have managed to make itto the fourth sector.
Break: Good thing it'll be your last.
Break: Erghhh...
Break: This isn't looking too good...
[Break flees from the lab]
Proton: ...
[Proton opens a door and a loud alarm sounds]
Proton: ...what was that?
???: Hello
Proton: Who are you?
???: I am Cayenne, a mechanical created by Death Pepper.
Cayenne: Death Pepper, the leader of this lab, awaits in thenext sector.
Cayenne: But do not worry, I am not your enemy.
Cayenne: I can assist you in your battle against Death Pepper,if you would allow it.
[Recruit Cayenne](Q) Recruit(W) Do not recruit
Cayenne: Okay then...
[Everyone stands in front of the enterance of the fifth sector]
Quest: Soon, the Itucher will be ours.
Scien: It's time to finally end this.
Romra: The final sector... that sounds a little intimidating...
Proton: It's been a long journey, but it's finally coming toan end...
Proton: After all of these years, we're ending this at the veryplace it started it...
Proton: For everyone who suffered...
Proton: For everyone who died...
Proton: We must win!
[Proton opens the door and everyone charges into the sector]
